transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello sir, Saddam Sheikh ji baat kar rahe hain Silver Enterprises se.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Ji namaskar sir, namaskar sir. Satyajit Tiwari bol raha tha main IndiaMART ke Noida head office se. Kya haal chaal hai sir aapke?
Customer: Bas badhiya hai sir.
Executive: Sir aapne ek request dali thi IndiaMART pe uske baad se sir aap phone hi nahi response kar rahe hain. To fir kaise hum log resolution de payenge. Aapne dala tha ki we complain many time we do not sell single phase motor but don't receive any single phase motor lead but more assist manager. To kya problem face kar rahe hain bataye mujhe.
Customer: Sir itni request dalne ke bawajud bhi single phase ki lead aa rahi hai aur hum log single phase mein hum log deal nahi karte hain sir.
Executive: Sir dekho agar single phase mein deal nahi kar rahe hain to usko not relevant mark karenge na. Jab aap same product ke 10 se 15 lead not relevant mark karenge na to dheere dheere wo cheeze surprise suppress ho jayenge. Kyunki aap dekhiye isme main bolta hu main batata hu. Roz ke aath aath 10 10 hum log not relevant kar rahe hain sir tab bhi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Nahi main batata hu main batata hu main batata hu. Not relevant sir isme jo hai nahi aise to sir irrelevant violet.
Executive: Nahi abhi to sir aapka November month mein nahi hua hai sir October mein hua tha November mein to nahi hua October mein thodi si hui thi. Lekin aap kis category ke lead ko mark karenge dekhiye ab jaise used electric motor hai ab used electric motor hai aap ye samajhiye ki jaise three phase motor hai electric motor hai super ABC electric motor hai inductions motor hai ye sare jo keywords hai na ab inke andar jitne bhi phase hote honge sir sab jayenge. Ab isko humne humne three phase electric motors ka to aayega hi aayega lekin agar isse related bhi agar koi hai sir to wo jayega.
Customer: Waha pe usko ignore karna hai ya fir agar lagta hai ki baat karna hai ya fir ignore karna hai us leads ko.
Executive: Baki ke aapke jo main dekh raha tha ki isme usko sir not relevant ka hi ek option hai wo dheere dheere dheere dheere hi ja ke khatam hoga sir ek back se nahi khatam hoga agar single phase main dekho agar aapke product mein to single S I N G L E single phase. Single phase sir hamare paas add nahi hai aapke pure keywords catalog mein add nahi hai. Ho sakta hai ki kabhi aapne iski koi lead check karne ke liye dekhne ke liye click kar di jiski vajah se wo aapke paas ja raha hai but humne add nahi kiya hai catalog mein. To us case mein sir hum usko waha se not relevant hi aap mark kariye. Right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Dusri cheez sir aapke kuch products hain aise jispe ki descriptions nahi hai to us par un products ka sir descriptions hame provide kar dete sir to hum uske descriptions aapka add kara dete. Nahi nahi hai network nahi tha.
Executive: To aap kab is kab free hote honge agar aap kabhi free hain to ek bar mujhe batate to main us pe aapka jab bhi free aap ho ek bar mujhe dijiye to ek bar hum log video meeting kar lete hain fir hum uske upar aap dekh lenge ki kahan pe aur hame kya add karna hai kya change karna hai abhi possible hai kya video meeting pe aap mere ko aap mere ko hai na aapka number send kar dijiyega main free hote hi main aapko hai na call back kar dunga.
Executive: Achcha to ek do teen kaam aur main bata de raha hu sir thoda sa ek to pehle aapne chuki phone uthaya to main bata du wo main aapko apna number bhi send kar dunga jab bhi aap free hoiyega to mujhe us pe hi likh dijiyega ta ki hum log catalog pe correction kar lenge. Sir aapke yaha buyers ki call kam response ho rahi hai keval 56% 90 days mein buyers ki call response hui hai aur agar main 30 days ki baat karu to 30 days mein bhi sir 66% call response rahi hai yaani 35% call sir miss ho rahi hai buyer ki.
Customer: Buyer ka call jab bhi aata hai buyer ka jab bhi call aata hai hum log utha hi lete hain lekin buyer ka call itna aata hi nahi hai hamare.
Executive: Nahi jitna bhi aata hai agar main September month ki baat karu 10 aaya hai 10 mein se char utha hai sir che call miss hui hai. November mahine mein abhi tak do aayi hai do mein se ek uthi hai ek miss hui hai to kam se kam miss na ho sir buyer ki call do number aapke add hai agar aur bhi koi number hai to dijiye hum wo bhi number add kara de.
Customer: Hmm nahi do number hi hai.
Executive: Plus sir review rating pe thoda sa focus kariye 3.3 ka aapka review rating hai thoda sa is review rating ko increase kariye buyer se baat hone ke baad unke paas ek jata hai jaruri nahi hai ki jo buyer aapke sath saman leke usi buyer ke sath ye cheez ho payega jo buyer aapke sath baat bhi karta hai wo bhi aapko review rate kar sakta hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Thik hai sir to ye wala kaam karke dijiye ye wala kaam karaiye kyunki sir isse hi business improve hoga baki agar aapke paas koi bhi single phase ki aati hai ya koi aise products ki lead aati hai jisme ki aap nahi chahte sir usko not relevant mark kare aur not relevant sir ek do panch karne se nahi hoga aap usko kariye ya usko ignore kariye kyunki thoda bahut aayega sir 100% relevancy bahut tough hai lekin agar baat karu to aapke catalog mein kahin bhi humne single phase wo nahi update kiya hai transformer humne kahin bhi single phase transformer update nahi kiya hai baki aur koi problem koi concern sir aapko services ko leke.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: To main ek kaam karta hu sir main ye jo aapka ye jo aapka concern open hai na main ise close kar deta hu apne number se whatsapp kar deta hu jab bhi aap free ho na mujhe update kar dena main ek video meeting arrange kar dunga hum log us pe kaam kar lenge thik hai?
Customer: Okay okay okay.
Executive: Thik hai main ise close kar deta hu aur aap update kar dijiyega okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Receiving single-phase leads despite not dealing in them.

- Buyer call response rate is low.

- Review rating is low.

- Wants to schedule a video meeting.



Resolution:

- Explained how to mark irrelevant leads.

- Suggested marking 10-15 leads as not relevant.

- Confirmed single-phase not in catalog keywords.

- Suggested providing product descriptions.

- Offered to arrange a video meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send 'Hi' on WhatsApp to schedule meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, not relevant, review rating, video meeting
